Page 360 Shirley Skipper-Scott Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 Office: 646-836-(b)(6) BlackBerry: 646-421-(b)(6) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov >>> Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov> 7/23/2019 12:30 PM >>> Can you get this for me. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------ Original message ------ From: Ray Ormond (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov Subject: Re: Epstein >>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will ne< >>> "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov> 07/23/2019 11:12 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone >>> "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov>
Date: 7/23
Page 930 DOJ-OGR-00024864

Shirley Skipper-Scott

Can you get this for me.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------ Original message ------
From: Ray Ormond (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lamine N'Diaye (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
Subject: Re: Epstein

>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will ne<
>>> "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov> 07/23/2019 11:12 >>> Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The content is related to an individual named Epstein and plans to move him to a GP unit. The email chain involves several individuals, including Shirley Skipper-Scott, Lamine N'Diaye, and Ray Ormond.
